name: @datkt/fs
description: Async file system access built on libuv

scripts.build: npm run build-constants && npm run build-library
scripts.test: rm -f test.kexe* && konanc test/ $(konanc-config -clr test.kc) -o test.kexe && ./test.kexe $(id -u) $(id -G | awk '{print $2}')

author: Joseph Werle <werle@littlstar.com>
